long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Global Shippers Rwanda Chrome Extension
Get what you love! With the GSR Shopping extension, you can shop multiple websites, checkout in one cart, and get affordable international delivery.

How it works: Shop from websites by adding items to the GSR Shopping cart. When youâ€™re done, instantly checkout from all stores at once and pay upfront for international shipping within the cart. 

With GSR Shopping, you can finally get what you want from all your favorite websites!

See just how easy it is to shop, and get fast, secure and affordable worldwide delivery to your home. Download and start shopping today!

GSR Shopping Extension for Chrome requires certain browser permissions in order to function properly, including permission to access each of the sites you browse in Chrome. For full transparency, we have listed permissions we require and the corresponding data collected below:

Browser Tabs
 * When you add an item to your shopping cart, we sync that data across each of the browser tabs on which the Shopping extension is active. We require permission from each of your open tabs to do this, however, we do not collect any data on the tabs you have open.

Broad Hosts
* We require permission to all HTTP or HTTPS websites in order to read product data so we can add items to your shopping cart. However, we ONLY collect any data on these sites if you choose to add an item to your shopping cart. The data we collect includes URL, product title, merchant name and price. This data is not sold or shared externally.
